splash_content.title: DISCOVER THE BEST FEATURE OF THIS RELEASE

articles.title: 🔥 Make.com integration
articles.desc: The new integration with make.com is now available publicly. Easily automate your tasks and create your own workflows with hundreds of apps!

articles.title: 🧩 Joomla 3 compatibility
articles.desc: We fixed a compatibility issue that could occur for websites based on Joomla 3.

articles.title: 🧩 Joomla modal style
articles.desc: The Joomla modal is no longer affected by the AcyMailing styles.

articles.title: 🧩 More custom fields handled
articles.desc: When inserting Joomla articles with custom fields, the media fields are shown correctly and the subform fields are now handled.

articles.title: 🧩 WooCommerce Guest Purchases
articles.desc: Guest purchases are now supported by the action target Purchased a product for WooCommerce automations.

articles.title: 🧩 More WooCommerce integrations
articles.desc: The subscription checkbox option is now available for the WooCommerce checkout Gutenberg block.

articles.title: 🎁 Better MailGun integration
articles.desc: The MailGun integration via API now uses the Reply-To email address specified in the AcyMailing configuration.

articles.title: 🎁 Better user fields insertion
articles.desc: The user fields inserted in emails are now formatted. For example date fields show the month name, phone fields show the country code, etc...

articles.title: 🎁 Better statistics export
articles.desc: The bounce details have been improved when you export the statistics full data.

articles.title: 🎁 Better performance
articles.desc: We improved various parts of the code to make AcyMailing faster and more reliable.
